title: Fix logo not updating

requirements.text: Fix the application logo so that it updates and displays correctly â€” ensure the logo asset reference in the HTML entry point and any React components that render the logo reflect the current/correct logo file and do not serve a stale or missing image.
acceptanceCriteria: The logo is visible and displays the correct, up-to-date image in the browser.
No broken image icon or stale cached logo appears on page load or refresh.
The logo asset path in index.html (favicon) and any logo rendered in the UI matches the intended image file.
The logo updates consistently across hard refresh and normal navigation.

nonGoals: Changing the logo design or branding beyond fixing the display/update issue.
